name: Coin Collector (IN SPAAAAACE)
description:
THIS WAS MY FIRST GAME WITH GAME MAKER STUDIO 2.

Made in 24 hours total (unintentional but cool)

Game: You are a spaceship collecting coins, you need to avoid the ghosts and lava. In order to get to the next level, you must collect all 15 coins in each level. There are 10 levels in total.

CONTROLS: W to go forwards, A and D to rotate left and right, kind of like car controls with no drift.

Made in Game Maker Studio 2
